hiveArticle.title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections
hiveArticle.body:
My Selections for @blocktrades World Cup are as below. If you would like to join, check the [announcement](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes). 

Though my country is not playing in this world cup, I am a keen follower of matches. Hopefully one day India will also play in the world cup. Fingers Crossed. Ohh Yeah, I am big fan of Brazil though :)
